channel.title: Comments on: Looking for Guest Posts
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Yonatan
item.dc:creator: Yonatan
item.description:
I found the article unfocused & all over the place.
The articles does try to deal with the issue with Chabad history and historiography, which is a valuable topic for discussion.
item.content:encoded:
I found the article unfocused & all over the place.

The articles does try to deal with the issue with Chabad history and historiography, which is a valuable topic for discussion.

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description: I saw it when the AJS review came. The question is more - What does it mean? What value does this have? How did it cause chabad to move from a metaphysical world of long hemsheks to a psychological concern with folly?
item.content:encoded: I saw it when the AJS review came. The question is more – What does it mean? What value does this have? How did it cause chabad to move from a metaphysical world of long hemsheks to a psychological concern with folly?
